Posts.EditableText:
Hello everyone,
In my free time, I often like to play games for entertainment and relaxation, I especially like character adventure games. Can you give me some websites that specialize in text adventure games so I can experience more of this game?
Thanks everyone.
Posts.HTML:
Hello everyone,
In my free time, I often like to play games for entertainment and relaxation, I especially like character adventure games. Can you give me some websites that specialize in text adventure games so I can experience more of this game?
Thanks everyone.

Posts.EditableText: You could also have a look at the IFDB. There are various searchs you can perform to narrow the results down to your choosing.
Posts.HTML: You could also have a look at the IFDB. There are various searchs you can perform to narrow the results down to your choosing.

Posts.EditableText:
I play Fighting Fantasy from steam.
Interestingly, it might be the one that led me down to the path of creating my own games.
When I started playing Fighting Fantasy as a kid, they are text games contained within a real life book, it makes me think "Huh! One day, I could create me game too."

The other option is https://ifdb.org/search?comp&sortby=awn&searchfor=series%3AAnnual+Interactive+Fiction+Competition
They are well crafted stories by competition winners.
